tasks.name: countries
tasks.mutation: mutation{ master_data { country { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}},  operationStatus { code message }} } } }}

tasks.name: timezones
tasks.mutation: mutation{ master_data { timezone { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message }} } } }}

tasks.name: locales
tasks.mutation: mutation{ master_data { locale { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message }} } } }}

tasks.name: tax_types
tasks.mutation: mutation{ master_data { tax_type { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message }} } } }}

tasks.name: commands
tasks.mutation: mutation mutateCommands($var: [IIoRestorecommerceCommandCommand!]!){ master_data { command { Mutate( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message }} } } }}
